nodes.text: Wedding of Revan and Bastila Shan

Following the Jedi Civil War, legendary Jedi Knights Revan and Bastila Shan were married. The groom had a hangover the following morning as a result of alcohol consumption. The wedding was only approved by the Jedi Council on the condition that Revan agreed not to spread his new-found philosophy of love, which they viewed as heresy, to the rest of the Order.

In the 2011 novel The Old Republic: Revan, it was revealed that Revan and Bastila Shan had married after the Battle of Rakata Prime, and while it was also noted that they resided on Coruscant after their union, where they were married was not stated.
